item.title: Managing Lecturers
item.dc:creator: brandon-cooper
item.content:encoded:
The educator plugin adds a "Lecturer" user role to WordPress. To create a lecturer, you need to go to Admin >> Users >> Add New and select a "Lecturer" role for this user.
The lecturers can log in to the website and create/edit/delete their own courses, lessons and quizzes.
item.excerpt:encoded: Educator allows you to assign the "Lecturer" role to a user. Lecturer is able to log in to WordPress and create/edit/delete his/her own courses and lessons.

item.title: Creating Quizzes
item.dc:creator: brandon-cooper
item.content:encoded: A quiz must be attached to a lesson. To create a quiz go to the lesson edit screen in the WordPress admin panel and find the "Quiz" section. Select the question type and click "Go". Enter the question in the "Question" field and add multiple choices using the "Add answer" button. Click "Save Question". Now, you can add a number of questions. Quizzes that contain only multiple choice questions are graded automatically.
item.excerpt:encoded: Educator WP has a nice quizzes system built in. You can create one quiz per lecture. A quiz is graded automatically when user submits the answers to the quiz questions.

item.title: Accepting PayPal Payments
item.dc:creator: brandon-cooper
item.content:encoded:
When the student clicks "Register" button on the course page, he/she is redirected to the "Payment" page. This page displays the course information and a selection of payment methods where use can choose PayPal.
The educator uses PayPal IPN in order to process the outcome of the PayPal payment. If payment succeeds, educator creates an "enrollment" for thepurchased course.
In order to configure PayPal, such that educator can use it, you need to go to the Admin >> Educator >> Settings, Payment tab. You need to add your PayPal business email and the "thank you" message.
item.excerpt:encoded: A student can pay for a course using the PayPal payment method. Learn how it works.

item.title: Accepting Cash and Check Payments
item.dc:creator: brandon-cooper
item.content:encoded:
When the student selects a "Check" or "Cache" for his/her payment method on the "Payment" page he/she is given the payment details on the "Thank you" page. The student should use these payment details to make a payment.
Once administrator makes sure that the student has paid, he/she can confirm his/her payment and set up an enrollment. To do this, the administrator has to go to Admin >> Educator >> Payments, find the student's payment entry and click "Edit", change status to "Complete" and click "Save Changes". This action will create an enrollment entry with status "inprogress" for this student so he/she can access the course lessons and take quizzes.
item.excerpt:encoded: If the student can't use PayPal, he/she is able to pay with check or cash. Learn how it works.

item.title: Grading Students
item.dc:creator: brandon-cooper
item.content:encoded: The lecturer has to go to "Enrollments" page in the back-end, find an enrollment, click "Edit" and change the "Grade" to a number between 0 and 100. The lecturer has to change the status to "Complete" in order to indicate that the student has completed this course.
item.excerpt:encoded: Finally, the lecturer has to grade the students as the course reaches its conclusion.

Our lecturers are practicing their field of expertise on daily basis.[/section_title] [educator_lecturers layout="grid" /] [/page_section] [page_section] [section_title title="Educator WP"]Have a look at educator WP features.[/section_title] [dm3_one_third]

Offer Courses Online

Offer courses online on your WordPress website. This plugin allows you to offer a number of courses to your visitors. The visitors can take a course for free or use one of the built-in payment methods to pay.
  • Visit Educator WP on WordPress.org
  • View Educator WP Documentation
  • How Educator WP Works
[/dm3_one_third] [dm3_two_third_last] [dm3_accordion] [dm3_collapse label="Add Quiz to Any Lesson" state="open"]Educator WP supports two types of questions: multiple choice and written answer. Quizzes can be graded automatically or manually by a lecturer.[/dm3_collapse] [dm3_collapse label="Payment Methods" state="closed"]Student can choose between 3 payment methods: PayPal, Cash and Check.[/dm3_collapse] [dm3_collapse label="Email Notifications" state="closed"]Students receive email notifications. You can configure templates of email notifications from admin panel.[/dm3_collapse] [dm3_collapse label="Roles for Lecturers and Students" state="closed"]Students and lecturers have different roles - lecturer, student. Lecturers can create courses and add grades.[/dm3_collapse] [dm3_collapse label="Course Categories" state="closed"]Categorize courses to make it easier for students to find what they need.[/dm3_collapse] [/dm3_accordion] [/dm3_two_third_last] [/page_section] [page_section bg_color="#f5f5f5"] [section_title title="Our Students"][/section_title] [dm3_testimonials autoscroll="10"] [dm3_testimonial authorname="Jinny Wise" authordescription="Web Design Student" photo="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/student-1.jpg" authorwebsite=""]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.[/dm3_testimonial] [dm3_testimonial authorname="James" authordescription="WordPress Student" photo="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/student-2.jpg" authorwebsite=""]At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blanditiis praesentium voluptatum deleniti atque.[/dm3_testimonial] [dm3_testimonial authorname="John Doe" authordescription="Web Design Business Student" photo="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/student-3.jpg" authorwebsite="http://google.com"]Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.[/dm3_testimonial] [/dm3_testimonials] [/page_section]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Theme Features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[dm3_one_half]

Educator WP Plugin

This theme is designed for Educator WP plugin. This theme letsyou offer courses online from your WordPress website. Learn more about Educator WP. [/dm3_one_half] [dm3_one_half_last]

WordPress Customizer

Customize the theme easily using the native WordPress Theme Customizer. You can change logo, color, layouts for posts and courses archives, and more. [/dm3_one_half_last] [dm3_divider style="space"/] [dm3_one_half]

Shortcodes

The theme integrates with Dm3Shortcodes custom shortcodes plugin so you can add various shortcodes to posts and pages with ease. [/dm3_one_half] [dm3_one_half_last]

Page Templates

This theme adds a number of useful page templates for a full-featured LMS system: Log in page, register page, user profile page. [/dm3_one_half_last] [dm3_divider style="dotted"/] [dm3_one_third]

Slideshow Manager

Create and editslideshows easily and attach them to posts and pages using shortcodes. The slideshows plugin creates custom post types for slideshows to make it easy to export/import your slideshows. [/dm3_one_third] [dm3_one_third]

Widget Ready

This theme is widget ready. You can add different widgets to sidebar and footer. You can install the WooSidebars plugin to let you add widgets to posts, pages and taxonomies. [/dm3_one_third] [dm3_one_third_last]

Support & Updates

We will periodically release bug fixes and introduce new features. Plus, you can contact us whenever you find an issue are have a question about the theme features. [/dm3_one_third_last] [dm3_divider style="dotted"/]

And many more features...

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This theme turns your WordPress website into a learning management system.
